trans-unit.source: Provides data for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent"></xref> event that is raised when you click on a selected control or a designer region in a selected control.
trans-unit.target: Udostępnia dane dla <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent"> </xref> zdarzenie, które jest wywoływane po kliknięciu wybrany formant lub projektanta region w formancie wybrane.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Ta klasa nie może być dziedziczona.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event is raised by the designer host for certain actions on a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>Zdarzenie jest wywoływane przez projektanta hosta dla pewne akcje w formancie na powierzchni projektu.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: For example, an event is raised when you click a selected control or a designer region in a selected control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Na przykład zdarzenie jest wywoływane po kliknięciu ikony lub projektanta region w formancie wybranego na powierzchnię projektu.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>Klasa zapewnia domyślne pełnomocnika, aby obsłużyć <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>zdarzeń.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: When you click a selected control or a designer region of a selected control at design time, the designer host initializes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object for a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event type, and then sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property with a DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs object.
trans-unit.target: Po kliknięciu ikony lub projektanta region wybrany formant w czasie projektowania, host projektanta inicjuje <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>obiekt do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>typu zdarzenia, a następnie ustawia <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>Właściwości z obiektem DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object indicates that you clicked a designer region, the default delegate in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class passes the DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Gdy <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>obiektu wskazuje, że kliknięto obszarem projektanta, delegata domyślne w <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>klasy przekazuje obiekt DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>metody.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method to process events that are raised when you click a control in the design host.
trans-unit.target: Klasy wywodzące się z <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>klasy zastąpienie <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>metody przetwarzania zdarzeń, które są wywoływane po kliknięciu formantu hoście projektowania.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region%2A> property represents the control designer region that the event applies to, if any.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region%2A>Właściwość reprezentuje obszaru projektanta kontroli dotyczy zdarzenia, jeśli istnieje.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location%2A> property represents the location on the design surface that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location%2A>Właściwość reprezentuje lokalizację na powierzchni projektu, który został kliknięty.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about events and delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać więcej informacji o zdarzeniach i delegatów, zobacz [NIB: zdarzenia i delegatów](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified region and location.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs"> </xref> z określonego regionu i lokalizacji.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> delegate method uses the DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs constructor to initialize a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> object for use with a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>metody obiektu delegowanego używa konstruktora DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs zainicjować <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs>obiekt do użycia z <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>obiektu.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: When you click a control region at design time, the designer host initializes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object for a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event type, and then sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property with a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: Po kliknięciu formantu region w czasie projektowania, host projektanta inicjuje <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>obiekt do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>typu zdarzenia, a następnie ustawia <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>właściwości o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs>obiektu.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The designer region that was clicked; used to initialize the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region*>.
trans-unit.target: Region projektanta, który został kliknięty; używany do inicjowania <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region*>

trans-unit.source: The location that was clicked, relative to the upper left corner of the region; used to initialize the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location*>.
trans-unit.target: Lokalizacja, w której został kliknięty względem lewym górnym rogu regionu; używany do inicjowania <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the location within the control that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lokalizację wewnątrz formantu, który został kliknięty.

trans-unit.source: The Location property contains the coordinates that identify where you clicked, relative to the upper left corner of the region.
trans-unit.target: Właściwość lokalizacji zawiera współrzędne identyfikujące klikniętego, względem lewym górnym rogu regionu.

trans-unit.source: The Location property is initialized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Właściwość lokalizacji jest inicjowana przez <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>konstruktora.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> identifying the location within the region that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> Identyfikacji lokalizacji w regionie, który został kliknięty.

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer region that was clicked, if any.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera region projektanta, który został kliknięty, jeśli istnieje.

trans-unit.source: The Region property represents the control designer region that was clicked, if any.
trans-unit.target: Właściwości Region reprezentuje obszar projektanta formant został kliknięty, jeśli istnieje.

trans-unit.source: The Region property is initialized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Właściwości Region jest inicjowany przez <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>konstruktora.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref> that the click event applies to, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no region was clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"> </xref> Który dotyczy zdarzenie click lub <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Jeśli kliknięto żaden region.
